description:
Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats’ plan goes awry and all hope looks to be lost!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Launcher werden abgefeuert! – Das Attentat auf Big Mom!
Explosion d`armes ! Le moment de l`assassinat de Big Mom
Launcher Sakuretsu! Big Mom Ansatsu no Toki
The Launcher Blasts! The Moment Of Big Mom`s Assassination!
¡El arma dispara!. Hora de asesinar a Big Mom
إطلاق القاذف! لحظة اغتيال بيغ مام
兵器[ランチャー]炸裂! ビッグ・マム暗殺の瞬間[とき]
